00022 /**
00023  * @file   QuantAvgDiff.cpp
00024  * @author Pete Klosterman
00025  * @date   Mon Jun 26 11:31:23 2006
00026  *
00027  * @brief  Class for doing MAS 4 average difference signal estimation.
00028  */
00029 
00030 //
00031 #include "chipstream/QuantAvgDiff.h"
00032 
00033 using namespace std;
00034 
00035 /**
00036  * @brief Constructor.
00037  * @param param Map of key/value pairs to set user-defined parameters.
00038  */
00039 QuantAvgDiff::QuantAvgDiff (std::map<std::string,std::string>& param)
00040 {
00041   setupSelfDoc(*this);
00042   // Set the string descriptor of this method.
00043   m_Type = getDocName();
00044   m_ChipCount = 0;
00045   m_ProbeCount = 0;
00046 }
00047 
00048 /**
00049  * @brief Set the number of probes and number of chips to be used for estimation.
00050  * @param numProbes Probe count.
00051  * @param numChips Microarray count.
00052  */
00053 void QuantAvgDiff::setBounds (unsigned int numProbes, unsigned int numChips)
00054 {
00055   m_ProbeCount = numProbes;
00056   m_ChipCount = numChips;
00057   // Set things up the first time through.
00058   if (m_PM.empty())
00059   {
00060     m_SetSignal.resize (numChips);
00061     while (m_PM.size() < numChips)
00062     {
00063       m_PM.push_back (vector<float>(numProbes));
00064       m_MM.push_back (vector<float>(numProbes));
00065     }
00066   }
00067   // Resize the number of columns (probes).
00068   if (numProbes != m_PM[0].size())
00069   {
00070     const unsigned int PMSize = m_PM.size();
00071     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < PMSize; ++i)
00072     {
00073       m_PM[i].resize (numProbes);
00074       m_MM[i].resize (numProbes);
00075     }
00076   }
00077   // Increase the number of rows (chips).
00078   if (numChips > m_PM.size())
00079   {
00080     const unsigned int PM0Size = m_PM[0].size();
00081     m_SetSignal.resize (numChips);
00082     while (m_PM.size() < numChips)
00083     {
00084       m_PM.push_back (vector<float>(PM0Size));
00085       m_MM.push_back (vector<float>(PM0Size));
00086     }
00087   }
00088 }
00089 
00090 /**
00091  * @brief Set up the quantification method given all the data about the probe
00092  * set, chip and data.
00093  *
00094  * @param psGroup Probes to be used.
00095  * @param iMart Raw intensities.
00096  * @param iTrans Transformations to be applied to data before use.
00097  * @param pmAdjust How to estimate background or MM probe.
00098  * @return bool True if setup sucessful, false otherwise.
00099  */
00100 bool QuantAvgDiff::setUp (ProbeSetGroup& psGroup, const IntensityMart& iMart, 
00101                           std::vector<ChipStream *>& iTrans, PmAdjuster& pmAdjust)
00102 {
00103   const unsigned int chipCount = iMart.getCelFileCount();
00104   const unsigned int probeSetsSize = psGroup.probeSets.size();
00105   assert (probeSetsSize > 0);
00106 
00107   unsigned int atomPmCount = psGroup.countPmProbes();
00108   if (atomPmCount == 0)
00109     return false;
00110   // Prepare the quantification method for this many atoms and chips.
00111   setBounds (atomPmCount, chipCount);
00112 
00113   atomPmCount = 0;
00114   m_Probes.clear();
00115   // Loop through and fill in the data as coming from the intensity mart.
00116   for (unsigned int psIx = 0; psIx < probeSetsSize; ++psIx)
00117   {
00118     const ProbeSet *ps = psGroup.probeSets[psIx];
00119     if (ps == NULL)
00120     {
00121       Verbose::out (1, "No probeset for index: " + ToStr (psIx));
00122       continue;
00123     }
00124     const unsigned int atomsSize = ps->atoms.size();
00125     for (unsigned int atomIx = 0; atomIx < atomsSize; ++atomIx)
00126     {
00127       Atom& atom = *(ps->atoms[atomIx]);
00128       const unsigned int probesSize = atom.probes.size();
00129       unsigned int channelIx = atom.getChannelCode();
00130       for (unsigned int probeIx = 0; probeIx < probesSize; ++probeIx)
00131       {
00132         Probe *p = atom.probes[probeIx];
00133         if (p->type == Probe::PMST || p->type == Probe::PMAT)
00134         {
00135           const unsigned int probeIndex = p->id;
00136           // Add probe to our probes and fill in the intensity data for each chip.
00137           m_Probes.push_back (p);
00138           for (unsigned int chipIx = 0; chipIx < chipCount; ++chipIx)
00139           {
00140             // PM transformation.
00141             float intensity = transformPrimaryData (probeIndex, chipIx, iMart, iTrans, channelIx);
00142             float mmIntensity = 0;
00143             // MM transformation.
00144             ///@todo use channel to grab correct adjustment 
00145             pmAdjust.pmAdjustment (probeIndex, chipIx, iMart, iTrans, intensity, mmIntensity);
00146             setPMDataAt (atomPmCount, chipIx, intensity);
00147             setMMDataAt (atomPmCount, chipIx, mmIntensity);
00148           }
00149           ++atomPmCount;
00150         }
00151       }
00152     } // atoms.
00153   } // probe sets.
00154 
00155   return true;
00156 }
00157 
00158 /**
00159  * @brief Create a new AvgDiff object.
00160  *
00161  * @param param Map of key/value pairs to initialize the object.
00162  * @return Pointer to SelfCreate object.
00163  */
00164 SelfCreate* QuantAvgDiff::newObject (std::map<std::string,std::string>& param)
00165 {
00166   if(param.size() != 0) { Err::errAbort(ToStr("No parameters for ") + ToStr(QUANT_AVGDIFF_STR)); }
00167   return new QuantAvgDiff (param);
00168 }
00169 
00170 /**
00171  * @brief Perform the estimation.
00172  *
00173  * Calculate the average pm - mm difference.
00174  */
00175 void QuantAvgDiff::computeEstimate()
00176 {
00177   for (unsigned int chipIx = 0; chipIx < m_ChipCount; ++chipIx)
00178   {
00179     const unsigned int pmSize = m_PM[chipIx].size();
00180     assert (pmSize);
00181     assert (pmSize == m_MM[chipIx].size());
00182     double diff = 0;
00183     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < pmSize; ++i)
00184       diff += m_PM[chipIx][i] - m_MM[chipIx][i];
00185     m_SetSignal[chipIx] = diff / pmSize;
00186   }
00187 }
